metadata.title: CVE-2019-16748 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In wolfSSL through 4.1.0, there is a missing sanity check of memoryaccesses in parsing ASN.1 certificate data while handshaking. Specifically,there is a one-byte heap-based buffer over-read in CheckCertSignature_ex inwolfcrypt/src/asn.c.

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
